p: Finally, with ZIKV, something similar to other viral diseases seems to happen in their post-epidemic transition to endemic status, and it is the fact that a high number of infections are asymptomatic as the clear example of the study of the island of Yap, where it was estimated that the 73% of the population was infected with ZIKV but only 18% of those infected (95% CI, 10 to 27), had a clinical illness that was probably attributable to ZIKV infection or 1 symptomatic person in 4.4 ZIKV infected persons (1).
